mapper.select: SELECT row_number() over (ORDER BY IGNORE_NUM DESC) rnum, IGNORE_NUM, IGNORE_DATE, IGNORE_MEM, IGNORE_D_MEM, MEM_NICK FROM IGNORE I, MEMBER M Where I.IGNORE_D_MEM IN M.MEM_ID and IGNORE_MEM=#{IGNORE_MEM} ORDER BY IGNORE_NUM DESC
select count(*) from IGNORE where IGNORE_MEM=#{IGNORE_MEM}
select count(*) from IGNORE where IGNORE_MEM = #{IGNORE_MEM} and IGNORE_D_MEM = #{IGNORE_D_MEM}
